mapper.select: select ID, NAME, JOINDATE, DELFLAG from MEMBER
select * from MEMBER where ID = #{ID}
select * from MEMBER where ID like '%#{searchValue}%' or NAME like '%#{searchValue}%' and JOINDATE between '%#{searchDate1}%' and '%#{searchDate2}%'
update MEMBER set DELFLAG = #{DELFLAG} where ID = #{ID}
select P_CODE, P_KIND, P_IMAGE, P_NAME, P_PRICE, P_STOCK from PRODUCT where P_DELFLAG = 'N'
insert into PRODUCT values(p_seq.nextval, #{P_NAME}, #{P_IMAGE}, #{P_PRICE}, #{P_STOCK}, #{P_SELL}, #{P_KIND}, SYSDATE, #{P_DETAIL}, '0', 'N')
update PRODUCT set P_DELFLAG = 'Y'
select O_ID, O_CODE, O_NAME, O_DATE, O_COUNT, O_PRICE, O_TOTAL, O_STATUS from ORDERCOMMAND

select O_ID, O_CODE, O_NAME, O_DATE, O_COUNT, O_PRICE, O_TOTAL, O_STATUS from ORDERCOMMAND where O_STATUS = '#{O_STATUS}%' and O_NUM = '%#{searchValue}%' and O_DATE between '%#{searchDate1}%' and '%#{searchDate2}%'
select * from ORDERCOMMAND where O_NUM = #{O_NUM}
update ORDERCOMMAND set O_STATUS = #{O_STATUS} where O_NUM = #{O_NUM}
select N_TITLE, N_DATE, N_HIT from NOTICE
select N_TITLE,N_CONTENTS, N_DATE, N_HIT from NOTICE where N_NUM = #{N_NUM}
insert into NOTICE values(n_seq.nextval, #{N_TITLE}, #{N_CONTENTS}, SYSDATE, '0')
update NOTICE set N_TITLE = #{N_TITLE}, N_CONTENTS = #{N_CONTENTS} where N_NUM = #{N_NUM}
delete from NOTICE where N_NUM = #{N_NUM}
select R_ID, R_NAME, R_DATE, R_CONTENTS, R_RATE, R_RECOMMEND from REVIEW where R_RELEVEL = '0'
select R_ID, R_NAME, R_DATE, R_CONTENTS, R_RATE, R_RECOMMEND from REVIEW where R_DATE between '%#{searchDate1}%' and '%#{searchDate2}%' and R_RELEVEL = '0'
select Q_ID, Q_CODE, Q_PRODUCT, Q_TITLE, Q_DATE, Q_STATUS from QNA_BOARD order by Q_GROUPNUM DESC, Q_RELEVEL ASC

select Q_ID, Q_CODE, Q_PRODUCT, Q_TITLE, Q_DATE, Q_STATUS from QNA_BOARD where Q_CATEGORY = #{Q_CATEGORY} AND Q_RELEVEL = '0' AND Q_DATE between '%#{searchDate1}%' and '%#{searchDate2}%' AND Q_ID like '%#{searchValue}%'
insert into QNA_BOARD values(q_seq.nextval, '관리자', #{Q_CODE}, #{Q_CATEGORY}, #{Q_TITLE}, #{Q_CONTENTS}, SYSDATE, #{Q_PRODUCT}, '', '', 1, #{Q_GROUPNUM})
update QNA_BOARD set Q_STATUS = #{Q_STATUS} where Q_NUM = #{Q_NUM}
select F_TITLE, F_CONTENTS from FAQ_BOARD where F_CATEGORY = #{F_CATEGORY}
insert into FAQ_BOARD values(f_seq.nextval, #{F_CATEGORY}, #{F_TITLE}, #{F_CONTENTS})
update FAQ_BOARD set F_CATEGORY = #{F_CATEGORY}, F_TITLE = #{F_TITLE}, F_CONTENTS = #{F_CONTENTS}
